jabber.client.SASLAuth

type
class
extends
Authentication
available in
flash, js, neko, php
RFC3920-SASL
RFC3920-BIND
Responsible for:
  1. Authenticating a client account using SASL
  2. Binding the resource to the connection
  3. Establishing a session with the server

authenticate(password : String, ?resource : String) : Bool

overrides jabber.client.Authentication
Inits SASL authentication.
Returns false if no supported SASL mechanism was offered by the server.
